pr_title: WFLY-13655 LOG INFO level message if the Hibernate second level cache is enabled

timeline.bodyText: This should be "Second", upper case S.
timeline.author: jamezp
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -31,8 +35,17 @@
 public interface JpaLogger extends BasicLogger {
 
     /**
-     * A logger with the category {@code org.jboss.jpa}.
+     * A logger with the category {@code org.jipijapa}.
      */
     JpaLogger JPA_LOGGER = Logger.getMessageLogger(JpaLogger.class, "org.jipijapa");
 
+    /**
+     * Inform that the Hibernate second level cache is enabled.
+     *
+     * @param puUnitName the persistence unit name
+     */
+    @LogMessage(level = INFO)
+    @Message(id = 20253, value = "second level cache enabled for %s")

timeline.message: WFLY-13655 LOG INFO level message if the Hibernate second level cache is enabled (minor change).
WFLY-13655 LOG INFO level message if the Hibernate second level cache is enabled (minor change).
